Text:
Tips: Some How if they blacklist key, then program will turn back into free version, No need to worry.Disconnect internet, and apply key again.

Go in program setting>update>shedule Upadte (check : dowload new fingerprints at shedule time) and in "update shedule" put such time in which your computer normally stay off , Apply. Done

Per PCMag.com - We all like getting something for free, but relying on Anvi Smart Defender for antivirus could be an expensive proposition. In testing, it proved almost wholly unable to cleanup malware threats and also did a very poor job preventing malware attacks on a clean system. Worse, it repeatedly identified perfectly valid Windows files as malware. You've been warned; stay away.
http://www.pcmag.com/article2/0,2817,2405313,00.asp
